question: You have been facing a lot of issues at work lately. Write a letter to your Reporting Manager informing him about this.In your letter:• Explain what / who is affecting your work and people's attitude towards you• What your expectations are from this work/office• How / what your manager can do to help you with these problems
text: I am writing this letter to take your attention to the problem I am facing in our office.

From my joining date, my colleagues put enormous pressure on me, they give me a lot of work to finish, due to which I have to work whole night in office,somehow which affect my health  and my family also effect when I reach home in the late night. Their behaviour is impolite to me, they just give me lectures when I didn't finish their work on time.

before on-board ,when I go through the company reviews, I found there are strict rules for bullying and harassment,  people respect each other, and people follow the code of conduct policy. Therefore reading this I join the company.

I want you will take strict action against these people, please let them know that I am also an experienced technical engineer, don't treat me like an unenlightenment. kindly issue them warning letters. Take an HR session with them, so they can understand the company rules and regulations regarding employees' rights.
